Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.name: title
Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The title for the LPRatingView, will displayed at the top and centered

Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.name: approvalButtonTitle
Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The approval button title, this will be displayed on the right side of the view

Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.name: rejectionButtonTitle
Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The rejection button title, this will be displayed on the left side of the view

Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.name: approvalButtonColor
Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The button color for the approval button

Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.name: rejectionButtonColor
Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The button color for the rejection button

Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.name: init(title:approvalButtonTitle:rejectionButtonTitle:)
Structs/LPRatingViewConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Creates a configuration with a title, approval title and rejection title

Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.name: ratingViewConfiguration(_:for:)
Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Asks the delegate to return an LPRatingViewConfiguration for the specified state of the view

Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.name: ratingViewDidFinish(_:with:)
Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the final state of the view has finished. The view which has notified and which status

Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.name: performOutAnimation(for:from:to:)
Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Asks the delegate to perform any animation code that may be required when animating the view OUT, to another state.

Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.name: performInAnimation(for:from:to:)
Protocols/LPRatingViewDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Asks the delegate to perform any animation code that may be required when animating the view IN, to another state.

Enums/LPRatingViewState.html#/s:18LPInte.name: initial
Enums/LPRatingViewState.html#/s:18LPInte.abstract: The view has just been added, user has not touched any buttons

Enums/LPRatingViewState.html#/s:18LPInte.name: approval
Enums/LPRatingViewState.html#/s:18LPInte.abstract: The user has touched the approval button for the first time

Enums/LPRatingViewState.html#/s:18LPInte.name: rejection
Enums/LPRatingViewState.html#/s:18LPInte.abstract: The user has touched the rejection button for the first time

Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.name: ratingApproved
Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.abstract: The user has approved twice, and the view may now be removed and any other neccessary code may be run

Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.name: ratingDenied
Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.abstract: The user has approved once but rejected the final approval, and the view may now be removed

Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.name: feedbackApproved
Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.abstract: The user has rejected once, but approved the final time, the view may now be removed and handling code may be run

Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.name: feedbackDenied
Enums/LPRatingViewCompletionStatus.html#.abstract: The user has rejected twice, and the view may now be removed

Classes/LPRatingTableViewCell.html#/s:18.name: delegate
Classes/LPRatingTableViewCell.html#/s:18.abstract: The delegate of the LPRatingView subview, this will just assign the delegate to the ratingView subview.

Classes/LPRatingTableViewCell.html#/s:18.name: ratingView
Classes/LPRatingTableViewCell.html#/s:18.abstract: The rating view which will be added to the cell’s contentView

Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.name: delegate
Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.abstract: The delegate for the rating view, this will control the configuration and any completion states for the view

Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.name: animationDuration
Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.abstract: The duration for the animation. This value will be divided by two once for animating the view out of the current state,

Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.name: buttonOffset
Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.abstract: The offset for both the leading and trailing edges.

Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.name: titleLabel
Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.abstract: The label which displays the title of the rating view

Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.name: approvalButton
Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.abstract: The approval button, touching this button will cause the delegate to be notified and may cause a state change

Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.name: rejectionButton
Classes/LPRatingView.html#/s:18LPIntegra.abstract: The rejection button, touching this button will cause the delegate to be notified and may cause a state change

Classes/LPRatingCollectionViewCell.html#.name: delegate
Classes/LPRatingCollectionViewCell.html#.abstract: The delegate of the LPRatingView subview, this will just assign the delegate to the ratingView subview.

Classes/LPRatingCollectionViewCell.html#.name: ratingView
Classes/LPRatingCollectionViewCell.html#.abstract: The rating view which will be added to the cell’s contentView
